verses.verse: Then he brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, the way <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%>: and he <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> that was over against the separate <S%H1508>place<s%>, and which was before the <S%H1146>building<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>.

<S%H6440>Before<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

Over against the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> cubits which were for the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, and over against the <S%H7531>pavement<s%> which was for the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, was <S%H862>gallery<s%> <S%H6440>against<s%> <S%H862>gallery<s%> in <S%H7992>three<s%> stories.

And <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> was a <S%H4109>walk<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H6442>inward<s%>, a <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%>; and their <S%H6607>doors<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>.

Now the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> were <S%H7114>shorter<s%>: for the <S%H862>galleries<s%> were <S%H398>higher<s%> than <S%H2007>these<s%>, than the <S%H8481>lower<s%>, and than the <S%H8484>middlemost<s%> of the <S%H1146>building<s%>.

For they were in <S%H8027>three<s%> stories, but had not <S%H5982>pillars<s%> as the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>courts<s%>: therefore the building was <S%H680>straitened<s%> more than the <S%H8481>lowest<s%> and the <S%H8484>middlemost<s%> from the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

And the <S%H1447>wall<s%> that was <S%H2351>without<s%> over <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H3957>chambers<s%>, <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> on the <S%H6440>forepart<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%>, the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

For the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> that were in the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>: and, lo, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> were an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

And from under these <S%H3957>chambers<s%> was the <S%H3996%H935>entry<s%> on the east <S%H6921>side<s%>, as one <S%H935>goeth<s%> into <S%H2007>them<s%> from the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>.

The <S%H3957>chambers<s%> were in the <S%H7341>thickness<s%> of the <S%H1444>wall<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>, over <S%H6440>against<s%> the separate <S%H1508>place<s%>, and over <S%H6440>against<s%> the <S%H1146>building<s%>.

And the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them was like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> which were <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%>, as long <S%H753>as<s%> they, and as broad <S%H3651%H7341>as<s%> they: and all their goings <S%H4161>out<s%> were both according to their <S%H4941>fashions<s%>, and according to their <S%H6607>doors<s%>.

And according to the <S%H6607>doors<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> that were <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> was a <S%H6607>door<s%> in the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%>, even the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H1903>directly<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1448>wall<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>, as one <S%H935>entereth<s%> into them.

¶ Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto me, The <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> and the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%>, which are <S%H6440>before<s%> the separate <S%H1508>place<s%>, they be <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%>, where the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H7138>approach<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things<s%>: there shall they <S%H3240>lay<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, and the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%>; for the <S%H4725>place<s%> is <S%H6918>holy<s%>.

When the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> therein, then shall they not go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place into the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, but there they shall <S%H3240>lay<s%> their <S%H899>garments<s%> wherein they <S%H8334>minister<s%>; for they are <S%H6944>holy<s%>; and shall <S%H3847%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>, and shall <S%H7126>approach<s%> to those things which are for the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Now when he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H4060>measuring<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, he brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>, and <S%H4058>measured<s%> it round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>, <S%H2568%H520>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%>, with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%>, with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.
He <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H1864>south<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%>, with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>.

¶ He turned <S%H5437>about<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H7307>side<s%>, and <S%H4058>measured<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7070>reeds<s%> with the <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%>.

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> it by the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>sides<s%>: it had a <S%H2346>wall<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> reeds <S%H753>long<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>, to make a <S%H914>separation<s%> between the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and the profane <S%H2455>place<s%>.
